languages.text: "Ритуал единения опасен, и Изгой знала цену. Мне неведомо, что она видит, слышит и чувствует. Но истина есть — душа Изгоя нечиста, и предки Алайтока заметили это. Скорее всего Изгоя ждет обряд перерождения... или погибель".

"The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."
languages.original_text: "Ритуал единения опасен, и Изгой знала цену. Мне неведомо, что она видит, слышит и чувствует. Но истина есть — душа Изгоя нечиста, и предки Алайтока заметили это. Скорее всего Изгоя ждет обряд перерождения... или погибель".

traits.locale_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast has been aware of the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed it. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: “结合仪式本来就有危险，她也心知肚明。我不知道她究竟看到了什么，听到了什么，或者感受到了什么，但真相只有一个——她的灵魂并不纯洁，阿莱托克的先祖已经察觉到了这一点。她很有可能要经历重生仪式，或者……就此死去。”
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: “结合仪式本来就有危险，她也心知肚明。我不知道她究竟看到了什么，听到了什么，或者感受到了什么，但真相只有一个——她的灵魂并不纯洁，阿莱托克的先祖已经察觉到了这一点。她很有可能要经历重生仪式，或者……就此死去。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: «El rito de vinculación es peligroso, y la proscrita conocía el precio. Ignoro lo que ve, oye y siente. Pero una cosa es segura: el alma de la proscrita es impura, y los ancestros de Alaitoc se han percatado. Lo más probable es que la proscrita deba superar el rito de renacimiento... o perecer».
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: «El rito de vinculación es peligroso, y la proscrita conocía el precio. Ignoro lo que ve, oye y siente. Pero una cosa es segura: el alma de la proscrita es impura, y los ancestros de Alaitoc se han percatado. Lo más probable es que la proscrita deba superar el rito de renacimiento... o perecer».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: « Le rite du Lien est dangereux et l'Errante en connaissait les risques. J'ignore ce qu'elle voit, entend ou ressent, mais une chose est certaine : l'âme de l'errante est impure et les ancêtres d'Alaitoc l'ont remarqué. Elle va sans doute subir un rite de renaissance... ou périr. »
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: « Le rite du Lien est dangereux et l'Errante en connaissait les risques. J'ignore ce qu'elle voit, entend ou ressent, mais une chose est certaine : l'âme de l'errante est impure et les ancêtres d'Alaitoc l'ont remarqué. Elle va sans doute subir un rite de renaissance... ou périr. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: "Das Ritual des Bunds ist gefährlich, und die Ausgestoßene kannte den Preis. Ich weiß nicht, was sie sieht, hört und fühlt. Aber die Wahrheit ist klar – die Seele der Ausgestoßenen ist unrein, und die Alaitoc-Ahnen haben das bemerkt. Wahrscheinlich wird die Ausgestoßene das Ritual der Wiedergeburt durchleben ... oder vergehen."
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: "Das Ritual des Bunds ist gefährlich, und die Ausgestoßene kannte den Preis. Ich weiß nicht, was sie sieht, hört und fühlt. Aber die Wahrheit ist klar – die Seele der Ausgestoßenen ist unrein, und die Alaitoc-Ahnen haben das bemerkt. Wahrscheinlich wird die Ausgestoßene das Ritual der Wiedergeburt durchleben ... oder vergehen."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: 「絆の儀式は危険なものだ。追放者はその代償を知っていた。彼女が何を見て、何を聞き、何を感じているかはわからない。追放者の魂は不純で、アレイトックの父祖はそれに気づいている。おそらく、追放者は再生の儀式を受けることになるか…滅びるかだ」
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: 「絆の儀式は危険なものだ。追放者はその代償を知っていた。彼女が何を見て、何を聞き、何を感じているかはわからない。追放者の魂は不純で、アレイトックの父祖はそれに気づいている。おそらく、追放者は再生の儀式を受けることになるか…滅びるかだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader

languages.text: "Bağlama Ayini tehlikelidir. Yurtsuz, olacaklardan haberdardı. Ne duyduğunu, gördüğünü ve hissettiğini bilmiyorum. Ortada tek bir gerçek var: Yurtsuz'un ruhu saf değil ve Alaitoc'lu ataları bunun farkına varmış. Yurtsuz, muhtemelen Yeniden Doğuş Ayini'ne girecek... Ya da yok olacak."
languages.original_text: "The Rite of Bonding is dangerous, and the Outcast knew the price. I do not know what she sees, hears, and feels. But there is one truth — the Outcast's soul is impure and the Alaitoc ancestors have noticed this. Most likely, the Outcast will go through the Rite of Rebirth... or perish."

traits.locale_text: "Bağlama Ayini tehlikelidir, Yurtsuz olacaklardan haberdardı. Ne duyduğunu, gördüğünü ve hissettiğini bilmiyorum. Ortada tek bir gerçek var: Yurtsuz'un ruhu saf değil ve Alaitoc ataları bunun farkına varmış. Yurtsuz, muhtemelen Yeniden Doğuş Ayini'ne girecek... Ya da yok olacak."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarFarseer_Leader
